events.message: We have successfully received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate, and the initial review looks promising.
The candidate's profile has been categorized under Engineering based on experience with software development and devops skills mentioned in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's recruitment process moving forward.
The initial phone screening with the candidate was completed successfully, confirming strong technical fundamentals and cultural fit.
The candidate responded promptly to our follow-up email and expressed enthusiasm about moving forward to the technical interview stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate on May 7th, with our senior engineering panel ready to assess key skills.
